oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Shadowbox with WWI artifacts
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Wooden shadowbox with British gas mask and other memorabilia of Sgt. Horace E. Collins, Co. E, 105th Supply Train, 55th Depot Brigade. A picture postcard of President Wilson and an American Legion cap for the 40/8 club are included. The 40/8 references French train cars of the WWI era which could hold 40 men or eight horses. Collins was from St. Elmo in Hamilton County, Tennessee.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:medium: Tools and equipment; Postcards; Memorabilia; Ephemera
